key_features: 3% cash rebate on your local Mastercard contactless transactions (including bus/train rides via SimplyGo)
0.3% cash rebate on all other retail transactions
Exclusive access to 7 SAFRA Clubhouses islandwide: enjoy access to club facilities including swimming pools, gyms, and entertainment facilities at any of the 7 SAFRA Clubhouses.
Every dollar spent at participating outlets and facilities at SAFRA earns you 1 SAFRAPOINT, on top of the SAFRA DBS Card cash rebates.

At MoneySmart, we strive to keep our information accurate and up to date. This information may be different from what you see when you visit a financial institution, service provider, or specific product site. MoneySmart shall not be liable to compensate the Customer should the information is not as updated as our Partner.

fees.annual_fee: No annual fee, so long as you remain a SAFRA member. SAFRA membership fee applies.
